name: Big Agnes Insulated Q-Core SLX Sleeping Pad - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
A 3-season pad that’s thick and warm, yet light and compact. Alternating I-Beam construction creates a smooth, stable surface without seams that create cold spots. Large outside air chambers keep you from rolling out of bed, and the ultra-warm insulation and reflective layer are welcome on chilly nights.Superlight ripstop nylon offers great tear resistance.Primaloft Silver synthetic insulation offers warmth retention and moisture resistanceInternal heat reflective tech.Offset I-beam construction distributes weight evenly for a comfortable sleep.Larger outer chambers help keep you centred.Laminated with aviation-grade TPU for durability and has an internal polyurethane coating.High-volume inflation valve with micro adjustments lets you inflate and deflate the pad easily.Included inflation sack made from upcycled material (colour varies).Antimicrobial treatment inside.
